Dev_Work_Hitbox.title: Development Work
Dev_Work_Hitbox.content: Prototyped and developed VR tools and interactive XR experiences in Unreal Engine to aid in virtual and film production, such as building .exes and .apks and mapping to controller input. Check out some key features:

About_Hitbox.title: About Me
About_Hitbox.content: Hi, I'm Sharliz! I’m a creative problem solver who loves finding quick, effective solutions and bringing ideas to life. With experience in multimedia design and game development and an interest for UI/UX, I enjoy mixing technical skills with imagination to make things that are fun, useful, and visually engaging. I’m always up for trying new things, staying active, and finding inspiration in unexpected places. Whether it’s social media, game design, 3D art, event planning, marketing, or brand and product design, I’m excited to put my creativity to work in ways that make an impact.

experience.title: QA Engineer at Apple
responsibilities: Test Apple Vision Pro hardware and software
Create automated test cases using JavaScript
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify defects

experience.title: 3D Modeler / VR Developer
responsibilities: Developed interactive VR experiences using Unreal Engine
Optimized 3D assets for mobile and headset performance
Implemented debugging tools to streamline testing
